statement.p: In 41.3 of the last 46 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{46}}={0.413}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{46}. \displaystyle{P}={0.413}\cdot{46}={18.998}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 46-18.998=27.002 We round that as requested to 27.
